Education.name: Beatrix Sylvani
Education.content: Hi! My name is Beatrix, but you can call me Bea(ðŸ)! I am one of the co-leaders for the Education team for GDSC Waseda. Our team is focused on hosting coding classes with the public and building a wide range of connections. For this semester, we are planning to host Figma and Powerpoint 101 classes. Our team is welcoming for anyone who wants to learn and test the waters for different kind of programming classes :>

Agile.name: Lahiru Udawatta
Agile.content: Hoi everyone ðŸ™Œ, my name's Lahiru, and I'm honored to be the lead of the Agile team for GDSC Waseda. Excited to see what we can build this year with all of you!

Marketing.name: Seongjoon Park
Marketing.content: Hi everyone! ðŸ˜Š Iâ€™m Seongjoon, a junior year student at Waseda University's School of International Liberal Studies (SILS). Our Marketing Team at GDSC Waseda is all about promoting and spreading the word about the exciting tech events, workshops, and opportunities we have in store. From creating engaging content to utilizing social media and other marketing channels, we're dedicated to enhancing the GDSC Waseda brand and ensuring that students don't miss out on all the innovation and learning opportunities we offer.

Finance.name: Hyonjoon PARK
Finance.content: Hey there! ðŸ˜Š I'm Hyonjoon, a junior at Waseda University's School of International Liberal Studies (SILS). I'm thrilled to serve as the team lead for GDSC Waseda's Finance Team this year. Our team plays a vital role in managing and optimizing project finances, ensuring the success of our tech initiatives. I'm looking forward to a fantastic year ahead and can't wait to collaborate with you and our GDSC community to achieve great things together!
